name: Own Your Glow Kit
about: What it is: A kit containing Medium Self-Tanning Drops, Travel Friendly Self-Tanning Water, and Applicator Mitt for a head-to-toe natural-looking glow...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Redness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Avocado Oil: High in vitamins A and C, itu2019s a fast-absorbing skin conditioning agent..- Chia Seeds: Rich in omega-3 fatty acids, they support skin barrier function..- Grapefruit Oil..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also vegan, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: Self-Tanning Drops transform your favorite moisturizer into a custom self-tanner. The more you drop, the more you glow. Self-Tanning Water is ultra-hydrating, quick, and easy to applyu2014no streaks, no stains, no smells. The velvety-soft applicator mitt is reusable and machine washable...This Set Contains:.-  1 oz/ 30 mL Self-Tanning Drops.- 3.4 oz/ 100 mL Self-Tanning Water.- Tanning Applicator Mitt.- Get Body Posi Booklet..
ingredients: -Coconut Oil: Hydrates and smooths the skin..-Chia Seed Oil: Helps improve skin hydration and support skin barrier..-Avocado Oil: Works as a skin-conditioning agent...Medium Self-Tanning Water: .Aqua (Water), Propylene Glycol, Dihydroxyacetone, Glycerin, Ethoxydiglycol, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Erythrulose, Glycereth-26, Agastache Mexicana Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Extract*, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil*, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil*, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil*, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil*, Methoxyphenyl t-Butylphenyl Propanediol, Tropaeolum Majus Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Panthenol, Ascorbic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propanediol, Sodium Benzotriazolyl Butylphenol Sulfonate, Tris (Tetramethylhydroxypiperidinol) Citrate, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Metabisulfite, Phenoxyethanol, Triethylene Glycol, CI 19140 (FD&C Yellow No.5), CI 42090 (FD&C Blue No.1), CI 16035 (FD&C Red No.40). ..Medium Self-Tanning Drops: .Aqua (Water), Dihydroxyacetone, Alcohol Denat. (SD Alcohol 40-B), Glycerin, Polysorbate 80, Xanthan Gum, Erythrulose, Propylene Glycol, Agastache Mexicana Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Tocopheryl Acetate (Vitamin E Acetate), Aloe Barbadensis Extract*, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Eucalyptus Globulus Leaf Oil*, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil*, Persea Gratissima (Avocado) Oil*, Salvia Hispanica Seed Oil*, Salvia Officinalis (Sage) Oil*, Methoxyphenyl t-Butylphenyl Propanediol, Tropaeolum Majus Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Ascorbic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propanediol, Sodium Metabisulfite, Parfum (Fragrance), Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Triethylene Glycol. ....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Self-Tanning Drops:.-Add two to 12 drops to your favorite moisturizer, mix together, and apply to skin..-Use two to four drops for a sunkissed look, six to eight drops for a golden look, 10 to 12 drops for a bronze look..-Wash hands after application.. .Self-Tanning Water:.-Exfoliate 24 hours before tanning..-Moisturize dry areas such as hands, feet, knees, ankles, and elbows prior to application..-Mist until skin is totally saturated, covering face. .-Leave hands and feet until last. Blend with a tanning mitt or hand in sweeping motions..-Thoroughly wash palms after use..-Your glow will develop in four to six hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. Just from getting a small sample I knew it was worth the cash. this pack was way better then just getting the 30ml drops!! you get the tanning water AND the 30ml drops for $47. the 30ml drops are $43... so yeah this was an awesome deal!! it doesn't leave me orange. My hands are dark but thats my own fault for forgetting to wash my hands. I used the mitt that came with it which btw (is super cute!!). I use the mitt & my hands. I used the face drops for my body too.. you can do that. it's not just for your face. it works the same however you use it. I seen before for face & body but this says face so I use for both and it's fine. I mix them both, idgaf!! lol ud83dude06ud83eudee0 Anyways after one use I was pretty dark, I barely used Amy product, so little that it still looks brand new... so I can tell this is going to last for a decent amount of time. So it might not look like much but it spreads out to be alot. You'll notice that the morning after using it. You'll see that it's strong and you don't need much. anyways it has a bit of tan smell but nothing bad at all and goes away.  I'm obsessed. it doesn't wash off. it becomes your skin which I love. it doesn't feel like your coating your skin. it feels like nothing and I love that so much!!! so far so good and I have VERY sensitive skin. this is worth it ladies!!!  so I've been doing the saturn tanning bed and this stuff made me even darker then that did...... so yeah. I'm gonna use this to replace the $40 Saturn sessions. I'll do both but more of this! I'm obsessed of you can't tell... ud83eudd23ud83eudd70ud83dude18

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used both the spray and drops and definitely prefer the drops. The spray can be messy and started to go bad and discolor after 3-6 months. The drops I find easy to use and mix with any moisturizer. I will be buying a mini or full size of it now that I just used all my deluxe sample I got from a favorites pack. I do wish they created different tones (especially olive toned) formats, not just light to dark.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely Orange tone  Develops quickly, easy to blend product has really little to no smell ufffc ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so difficult to evenly distribute on your skin. After a couple of days it already starts coming off in blotchy patches. It only looks good for one day and thatu2019s IF you manage to apply it evenly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Works wonderfully, however my husband told me I smelled like boiled hot dog water. We hooked up the night of application and the tan on my stomach, the inside of my arms, as well as my legs came out lighter the rest of my body.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The drops worked on my face, but also on my sebaceous filaments. This was my first facial tanner so I donu2019t know if this is common. Ended up returning it because I didnu2019t want my nose to be a tanned strawberry

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for the past few weeks and remain unsure about it. This is my first self/tan product Iu2019ve used.  I am pretty pale so started with only a few drops in medium with my moisturizer and I barely noticed any results. Iu2019ve gone up to 9 drops and still not that dark, but I did find it even. I think Iu2019m mixing it with too much cream. Have to keep tweaking that. I tried the spray and used the mitt as directed, I found it very uneven. Also I noticed the sunspots/pigmentation on my face and legs became remarkably much more noticeable. Didnu2019t love that. I do love that it doesnu2019t stain clothes/bedding! Thatu2019s a huge plus as this is what has deterred me from trying tanners in the past. Also, it makes my skin feel softer.  Like I said Iu2019m new to the self tanning game, so it might be me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a good deal for your money. The way that you get two isle of paradise products full sized and itu2019s basically cheaper than purchasing both separately is a steal. Medium is for sure the perfect self tanner colour for my skin tone as it gives me that perfect sunkissed glow and doesnu2019t look orange at all!
Cela fait deju00e0 un moment que je lu2019utilise! Il laisse le teint bronze et uniforme! Ju2019adore ce produit

reviews.review_title: A must have for a glowy tanned complexion.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As I live in a sunless void, I love the face tanning drops. I mix them in twice a week in my moisturizer (protini polypeptide by drunk elephant). One time with 6-8 drops and 3-4 days later 2 drops to get a little boost. Itu2019s not streaky, finish is natural. It does sneak up on you. So start with a lower amount of drops until you find your sweet spot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I gave this 3 stars but it's really more like 3.5 stars.   Pros:  doesn't stain sheets (and I have white sheets, too) It does give a nice glow Cute packaging   Cons: I really don't like the smell of it, it's a bit musty. I think id prefer for it to be scented something fun and beachy Since it's clear, it is very difficult to tell where you have applied it and where you missed until it develops 6 hours later and then it is too late to fix ud83dude14
Iu2019ve tried the sample on my face today, but when applied to the body does it stain when you go to bed after application?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start off with, I'm completely new to this I had no idea what to expect. I didn't know what color to grab, and I didn't know exactly what the process was I simply tried to follow the instructions BUT, I took a bath and exfoliated and shaved to be sure I had even textures and I dried out of the shower and moisturised and applied the spray, now I was extremely let down and thought it wouldn't work... it took 12 hours to develop on freshly washed skin. the instructions did say to exfoliate 24 hours before. or it won't develop as fast in my experience, I did half of one leg to try and I was pretty sad after 6 ish hours I saw no change, I went to bed and woke up in the morning and man did it take. it needs alot of time. for the rest of the body when applying it, it's developed way faster. I have rinsed it off after 12 hours for the first test. and it's a nice warm glow it seemed a bit patchy but a nice rinse took care of it!! let this product do its thing and patience is key. I was ready to give up but the redness in my skin is gone and it's a nice and even texture all throughout!  10/10

reviews.review_title: Great warm realistic tan on my pale skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty great to give a glow in the middle of winter! I really liked the spray application with the mitt- I missed a couple spots and could see how well it worked/ blend like crazy!  Will buy again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the drops (although be careful because it can get orangey quite easily!), but the spray just gave me horrible rashes!! I do have quite sensitive skin but idku2026

reviews.review_title: Maybe the cheaper ones are worth the chemicals...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE that this is a clean product, but between the price and the payoff... ive been thinking about trying the cheaper, less clean brands that people praise. Application is a bit confusing as the instructions acted more of a point in the right direction for me, I sort of had to make up my own method of application that worked for me. After it's all done it looks pretty good! However one shave and it's all gone. Maybe it's the shaving cream I'm using, but it sure is annoying seeing all that hard work shave away.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So, I hate to be a low star reviewer, and Iu2019m sure the product works for some skin types. Iu2019ve used a fair amount of fake tans, however this one was problematic. The spray is NOT even, and leaves the skin looking very spotted and blotchy, even after exfoliating very well. The oil sticks to hair by the eyebrows and makes them look uneven. I also found that it sticks to the side of the nose, typically where there is a bit more roughness/pores in the skin. It smells great, and it works good for the body, but most definetley not a favorite for my face. It caused me to break out pretty bad, and the mornings I woke up after applying it my skin felt extremely irritated and dry. This was however my skins reaction and may vary depending on the person, itu2019s a good product for the price and if it works for your skin I think itu2019s great! I did however have to bring it back after it made me start breaking out, very kind of the staff to take it back :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This thing is such a steal. I absolutely love the drops and I use the glove/spray for hard to reach places

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not the best for acne prone skin, it broke me out. Smells weird and is hard to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: BEST SELFTAN iu2019m at my third kit and itu2019s still my favourite. nothing. compares.ud83eudd0dud83eudd0dud83eudd0dud83eudd0d

reviews.review_title: Finallyu2026 a self-tanner for a natural glow!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best self-tanning product Iu2019ve ever used. I nearly gave up on this product category after so many orangey, stinky, and streaky experiences. This formula allows you to mix the exact right amount for your skin tone and preference, so if your looking to for a little oomph and glow you can use 2 drops vs 4-6 drops if you are looking for a more tanned appearance.

reviews.review_title: Hand Down THE Best Self Tanner!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So easy to useu2026no orange on hands, ankles or feet thanks to the spray mist and mitt!  The drops gave the perfect colour with my favourite moisturizer and it doesnu2019t smell like cup ou2019 noodles!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First self tan I ever bought and am so happy with it! So easy to use with good results!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This kit is such a good deal considering the price and how much product you get. The mitt is on the cheaper side but i have other tanning mitts to use so itu2019s not that big of a deal. I noticed some other reviews  stating that their tanning drops and mists came u201cexpiredu201d mine had clumps in it too but i later found out it isnu2019t expired itu2019s just the product s separating after going through shipping and different temperature changes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've purchased both the water and drops individually before - I bought this set for the value - if you're going to get either the drops or mist, it is a way better value to get this set! The tanning water and drops are both great for fair to light skin, and I notice some colour/glow after one application. The colour is a little on the golden side but still looks natural. There is a bit of a brown sugar/fresh self-tanner smell but I quite like it. The little body positivity book is cute too. My only complaint is the tanning mitt - as someone with small hands and short natural nails, it barely covers my wrist and only one side can actually be used for application. I would recommend this if you're looking for a face tanner serum and want a good deal, but would suggest buying a different tanning mitt to go along with things.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this kit and have used the face drops a few times. Just went to use for my body and this is what I found. Super cloudy and almost growing something. Iu2019ve never used this before I hadnu2019t even opened it. Iu2019m really bummed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am returning this. I love the tanning drops for my face, so I bought this for the deal. But the self tanning water mist does not work. I applied a couple of layers and slept on it for 8 hours and nothing appeared. When I washed it off, I looked the same. And I did not like the way the glove applied it. So I am returning it and buying the tanning dropu2019s separately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great value set and I am in love with this self tanner. Will continue to repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Easily the best tan Iu2019ve found for my skin tone.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So natural looking, looks like a real tan! I am so happy with this colour! I only added two drops of the face tan to my moisturizer to use for my face, neck & blending my wrists/hands & Iu2019ve never had such a flawless tan. Not one blotchy areas

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best self tanner I have ever used! the drops are great for the face area mixed in with your moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first ever self-tanning product I ever used and this product is amazing! Easy to apply and works wonderfully to give you that glowing, bronzed, radiant skin. Doesn't look fake either. So lovely and always a repurchase for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love this set! such a good deal that it comes with the full size tanning oil! product works really well for me, I donu2019t find it too orange or blotchy!
